verses.verse: And God <S%H430><s%> spoke <S%H1696><s%> all these words <S%H1697><s%>, saying <S%H559><s%>,
I am the Lord <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%>, which have brought <S%H3318><s%> you out of the land <S%H776><s%> of Egypt <S%H4714><s%>, out of the house <S%H1004><s%> of bondage <S%H5650><s%>.
You shall have no other <S%H312><s%> gods <S%H430><s%> before me <S%H6440><s%>.

You shall not make <S%H6213><s%> unto you any engraved image <S%H6459><s%>, or any likeness <S%H8544><s%> of any thing that <S%H834><s%> is in heaven <S%H8064><s%> above <S%H4605><s%>, or that is in the earth <S%H776><s%> beneath <S%H4325><s%>, or that is in the water under the earth <S%H776><s%>:

You shall not bow down <S%H7812><s%> yourself to them <S%H5647><s%>, nor serve them <S%H3068><s%>: for I the Lord your God <S%H430><s%> am a jealous <S%H7067><s%> God <S%H410><s%>, visiting <S%H6485><s%> the iniquity <S%H5771><s%> of the fathers <S%H1><s%> upon the sons <S%H1121><s%> unto the third <S%H8029><s%> and fourth <S%H7256><s%> generation of them that hate me <S%H8130><s%>;
And showing <S%H6213><s%> mercy <S%H2617><s%> unto thousands <S%H505><s%> of them that love <S%H157><s%> me <S%H8104><s%>, and keep my commandments <S%H4687><s%>.

You shall not take <S%H5375><s%> the name <S%H8034><s%> of the Lord <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%> in vain <S%H7723><s%>; for the Lord <S%H3068><s%> will not hold him guiltless <S%H5352><s%> that takes <S%H5375><s%> his name <S%H8034><s%> in vain <S%H7723><s%>.
Remember <S%H2142><s%> the sabbath <S%H7676><s%> day <S%H3117><s%>, to keep it holy <S%H6942><s%>.
Six <S%H8337><s%> days <S%H3117><s%> shall you labor <S%H5647><s%>, and do <S%H6213><s%> all your work <S%H4399><s%>:

But the seventh <S%H7637><s%> day <S%H3117><s%> is the sabbath <S%H7676><s%> of the Lord <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%>: in it you shall not do <S%H6213><s%> any work <S%H4399><s%>, you nor your son <S%H1121><s%>, nor your daughter <S%H1323><s%>, your manservant <S%H5650><s%>, nor your maidservant <S%H519><s%>, nor your cattle <S%H929><s%>, nor your stranger <S%H1616><s%> that is inside your gates <S%H8179><s%>:

For in six <S%H8337><s%> days <S%H3117><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%> made <S%H6213><s%> heaven <S%H8064><s%> and earth <S%H776><s%>, the sea <S%H3220><s%>, and all that in them is <S%H5117><s%>, and rested the seventh <S%H7637><s%> day <S%H3117><s%>: why the Lord <S%H3068><s%> blessed <S%H1288><s%> the sabbath <S%H7676><s%> day <S%H3117><s%>, and hallowed it <S%H6942><s%>.

Honor <S%H3513><s%> your father <S%H1><s%> and your mother <S%H517><s%>: that your days <S%H3117><s%> may be long <S%H748><s%> upon the land <S%H127><s%> which the Lord <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%> gives you <S%H5414><s%>.
You shall not kill <S%H7523><s%>.
You shall not commit adultery <S%H5003><s%>.
You shall not steal <S%H1589><s%>.
You shall not speak <S%H6030><s%> false <S%H8267><s%> witness <S%H5707><s%> against your neighbor <S%H7453><s%>.

You shall not covet <S%H2530><s%> your neighbors <S%H7453><s%> house <S%H1004><s%>, you shall not covet <S%H2530><s%> your neighbors <S%H7453><s%> wife <S%H802><s%>, nor his manservant <S%H5650><s%>, nor his maidservant <S%H519><s%>, nor his ox <S%H7794><s%>, nor his donkey <S%H2543><s%>, nor any thing that is your neighbors <S%H7453><s%>.

And all the people <S%H5971><s%> saw <S%H7200><s%> the thunderings <S%H6963><s%>, and the lightnings <S%H3940><s%>, and the noise <S%H6963><s%> of the trumpet <S%H7782><s%>, and the mountain <S%H2022><s%> smoking <S%H6226><s%>: and when the people <S%H5971><s%> saw <S%H7200><s%> it <S%H5128><s%>, they wavered, and stood <S%H5975><s%> afar off <S%H7350><s%>.

And they said <S%H559><s%> unto Moses <S%H4872><s%>, Speak <S%H1696><s%> you with us <S%H8085><s%>, and we will hear: but let not God <S%H430><s%> speak <S%H1696><s%> with us <S%H4191><s%>, lest we die.

And Moses <S%H4872><s%> said <S%H559><s%> unto the people <S%H5971><s%>, Fear <S%H3372><s%> not <S%H430><s%>: for God is come <S%H935><s%> to <S%H5668><s%> prove <S%H5254><s%> you <S%H3374><s%>, and that his fear may be before your faces <S%H6440><s%>, that you sin not <S%H2398><s%>.
And the people <S%H5971><s%> stood <S%H5975><s%> afar off <S%H7350><s%>, and Moses <S%H4872><s%> drew near <S%H5066><s%> unto the thick darkness <S%H6205><s%> where God was <S%H430><s%>.

And the Lord <S%H3068><s%> said <S%H559><s%> unto Moses <S%H4872><s%>, Thus you shall say <S%H559><s%> unto the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>, you have seen <S%H7200><s%> that I have talked <S%H1696><s%> with you from heaven <S%H8064><s%>.
You shall not make <S%H6213><s%> with me gods <S%H430><s%> of silver <S%H3701><s%>, neither shall you make <S%H6213><s%> unto you gods <S%H430><s%> of gold <S%H2091><s%>.

A altar <S%H4196><s%> of earth <S%H127><s%> you shall make <S%H6213><s%> unto me <S%H2076><s%>, and shall sacrifice on it your burnt offerings <S%H5930><s%>, and your peace offerings <S%H8002><s%>, your sheep <S%H6629><s%>, and your oxen <S%H1241><s%>: in all places <S%H4725><s%> where I record <S%H2142><s%> my name <S%H8034><s%> I will come <S%H935><s%> unto you and I will bless you <S%H1288><s%>

And if you will make <S%H6213><s%> me a altar <S%H4196><s%> of stone <S%H68><s%>, you shall not build <S%H1129><s%> it of cut stone <S%H1496><s%>: for if you lift up <S%H5130><s%> your tool <S%H2719><s%> upon it <S%H2490><s%>, you have polluted it.
Neither shall you go up <S%H5927><s%> by steps <S%H4609><s%> unto my altar <S%H4196><s%>, that your nakedness <S%H6172><s%> be not discovered on it <S%H1540><s%>
